name: Organization
definition: collection of one or more people, or groups of people formed together into a community or other social, commercial or political structure to act, or that is designated to act, towards some purpose, such as to meet a need or pursue collective goals on a continuing basis
label: organization

name: OrganizationalSubUnit
explanatoryNote: In other words, it is not a legal entity in its own right.
label: organizational sub-unit
definition: any department, service, and other entity within a larger organization that only has full recognition within the context of that organization, but requires identification for some purpose

name: Membership
label: membership
definition: situation, corresponding to an n-ary relation, in which some group or organization has at least one member (person or organization) for some period of time

name: OrganizationMember
label: organization member
definition: party (person or organization) that has a membership role with respect to some organization

name: OrganizationIdentificationScheme
label: organization identification scheme
definition: identification scheme dedicated to the unique identification of organizations

name: OrganizationName
definition: designation by which some organization is known in some context
label: organization name

name: MemberBearingOrganization
definition: role of a group or organization that has members that are people or other organizations
label: member-bearing organization

name: OrganizationIdentifier
label: organization identifier
definition: identifier assigned to an organization within an organization identification scheme, and unique within that scheme

name: OrganizationPartIdentifier
definition: identifier allocated to a particular organizational sub-unit
label: organization part identifier

name: hasOrganizationMember
label: has organization member
definition: indicates the party that is the member in an organizational membership situation

name: isSubUnitOf
definition: relates a part of an organization to the larger entity
label: is sub-unit of

name: hasMembership
label: has membership role
definition: identifies the organization acting in the role of having members in an organizational membership situation

name: hasSubUnit
definition: relates an organization to a part of that organization
label: has sub-unit

name: isMembershipPartyIn
label: is membership party in
definition: indicates the context of membership in which the party plays the role of having members

name: isOrganizationMember
definition: indicates the context of membership in which some party is an organization member
label: is organization member
